name: Alan Pest Control
description:
Story

  Alan Pest Control is a secret organization who deals with the most dangerous pests in the world, you are playing as a special agent who is sent to "Bunker-3068" to investigate why it is abandoned. You thought it might just be another normal working day, but as you walk further into the bunker, you discovered that something is really wrong about this place...

Controls

Movement: W,A,S,D

Fire: Left mouse

Melee: F

Jump: Space

Interact: E

ShakeOff: shake mouse Left&Right quickly

System requirements

( measured for 1080p, 60fps )

Graphics: geforce gtx 1060 / radeon rx 570

Processor: intel core i3 8300 / amd ryzen 3 1200

Memory: 8GB

Update notes

  Recently I received a lot of complains about the difficulty of the game, so in the v.1.3 update I implemented the Difficulty System:

EASY: For non-FPS gamers
NORMAL: For players who often play 3D games
HARD: For experienced gamers who played competitive FPS games

Other notes

  I'm a Taiwanese and English isn't my mother language, I've done all the translation myself , so the words I'm using might be clunky and inaccurate. Also this is my first time creating a game to release to public, and hopefully I can make more in the future.

Feel free to leave your thoughts about the game!
